name: UpdateStatusPagePost
description:
Update a post on a status page by its ID.

Use this tool to update an existing post on a specific status page. Requires the status pages write permission.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the status page resource to be updated.

parameters.name: status_page_post_id
parameters.description: The ID of the status page post to update.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Status Page Post.

parameters.name: versioning_header
parameters.description: The versioning header for the API request, used to specify the API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: status_page_post_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details of the status page post, such as type, title, post type, and timing for maintenance posts. It includes the status page ID and type.

type.description: The type of the object returned by the API - in this case, a Status Page Post.

title.description: The title given to a Post.

starts_at.description: The date and time the Post intent becomes effective - only for maintenance post type.

ends_at.description: The date and time the Post intent is concluded - only for maintenance post type.

type.description: A string that determines the schema of the object.

post.description: Request schema for creating a given Status Page Post resource.
